name: ecommerce-follow-along
description: Building an e-commerce app using the MERN stack. This is a full-fledged e-commerce application built using the **MERN Stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). The goal of this project is to learn how to build and deploy a real-world application with the MERN stack, focusing on key features like authentication, product management, and order handling.
